info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 6 at 9:21AM CDT until June 10 at 2:06AM CDT by NWS Tulsa OK
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma...
Caney River near Ramona affecting Washington OK County.
Caney River at Bartlesville affecting Washington OK County.
Caney River near Collinsville affecting Rogers and Tulsa Counties.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Caney River near Ramona.
* WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, moderate agricultural flooding occurs from Ochelata to the northeastern tip of Tulsa County. Some rural roads are impassable including the road between Ramona and Talala.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 28.2 feet late Saturday night. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. This forecast includes rain that fell this morning and forecast rainfall for another thunderstorm complex that is expected late tonight. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING
